original_title: Decision on election spending limit to be finalized today
original_body_lines: The People’s Action for Free and Fair Elections (PAFFREL) has announced that a final decision will be taken today (16) regarding the amount a candidate can spend per voter in the upcoming presidential election.
The Executive Director of PAFFREL, Rohana Hettiarachchi, stated that this decision will be determined during a discussion between the Election Commission and political party representatives.
